title: Marriage and divorce
brief_description: No ceremony symbolises the hopes of man and woman than that or marriage. Every day is someone’s wedding day. Yet in a world full of disturbing realities, one out of every three couples (in America) is heading for trouble. This film surveys the problem of broken homes and offers the opinions of experts as to what should be done.
